description: In a historic move, the NDA Government has unveiled a pro-farmer Crop Insurance Scheme. “The Pradhan Mantri Fasal Bima Yojana” will replace the existing National Agricultural Insurance Scheme (NAIS) and Modified NAIS (MNIAS).
caption: pmindia.gov.in
message: A letter to my hardworking farmer brothers and sisters, on the Pradhan Mantri Fasal Bima Yojana.  http://pmindia.gov.in/en/news_updates/nda-govt-launches-new-crop-insurance-scheme-minimum-premium-maximum-insurance-for-farmers/?comment=disable
